org.springframework.aop.framework
Class AbstractMethodPointcut

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.springframework.aop.framework.AbstractMethodPointcut
All Implemented Interfaces:
MethodPointcut
Direct Known Subclasses:
AlwaysInvoked, RegexpMethodPointcut
public abstract class AbstractMethodPointcut
extends java.lang.Object
implements MethodPointcut

Abstract convenience superclass for implementations of DynamicMethodPointcut or StaticMethodPointcut. Handles interceptor.

Since:
July 22, 2003
Version:
$Id: AbstractMethodPointcut.java,v 1.1.1.1 2003/08/14 16:20:12 trisberg Exp $
Author:
